pkgmetadata.longdescription: Chic and Sleek Functions for Beautiful Statisticians // Because your linear models deserve better than console output. A sleek color palette and kable styling to make your regression results look sharper than they are. See the package manual at https://g ithub.com/JesusButForGayPeople/snazzieR/releases/download/v0.1. 0/snazzieR_0.1.0.pdf.
